Missouri_City.KBPX-LD:
KBPX-LD, virtual and UHF digital channel 46, is a low-power television station licensed to Houston, Texas, United States. Owned by Ion Media Networks, it is an affiliate of The Country Network and a sister station to Conroe-licensed Ion Television owned-and-operated station KPXB-TV (channel 49).


== History ==
The station began broadcasting in 1990 from One Shell Plaza on channel 33 under the call sign K33DB as a low-powered translator for KTFH (renamed KPXB-TV in 1998), in order to improve KTFH's analog coverage in Houston since its full-power analog transmitter site was located in the far northern suburbs of Houston.
